data.oai_dc:dc: Data on species co-occurrence from the lower Kern River canyon and Oiler canyon. Any stop that contained multiple species is listed twice (e.g. if stop 1 contained C. xantiana and C. unguiculata, there are two separate entries in the file--stop 1: X and stop 1: U). Species were abbreviated as follows: C = Clarkia cylindrica, D = C. dudleyana, E = C. exilis, P = C. xantiana ssp. parviflora, S = C. speciosa, U = C. unguiculata, X = C. xantiana ssp. xantiana.
